text.ascii: arjuna uvAca
text.ur: arjuna uvāca

text.ascii: kRtAstram abhivizvastam atha mAM harivAhanaH
text.ur: kr̥tāstram abhiviśvastam atha māṁ harivāhanaḥ

text.ascii: saMspRzya mUrdhni pANibhyAm idaM vacanam abravIt
text.ur: saṁspr̥śya mūrdhni pāṇibhyām idaṁ vacanam abravīt

text.ascii: na tvam adya yudhA jetuM zakyaH suragaNair api
text.ud: न त्वमद्य युधा जेतुं शक्यः सुरगणैरपि
text.ur: na tvam adya yudhā jetuṁ śakyaḥ suragaṇair api

text.ascii: kiM punar mAnuSe loke mAnuSair akRtAtmabhiH
text.ur: kiṁ punar mānuṣe loke mānuṣair akr̥tātmabhiḥ

text.ascii: aprameyo 'pradhRSyaz ca yuddheSv apratimas tathA
text.ur: aprameyo ’pradhr̥ṣyaś ca yuddheṣv apratimas tathā

text.ascii: athAbravIt punar devaH saMprahRSTatanUruhaH
text.ur: athābravīt punar devaḥ saṁprahr̥ṣṭatanūruhaḥ

text.ascii: astrayuddhe samo vIra na te kaz cid bhaviSyati
text.ud: अस्त्रयुद्धे समो वीर न ते कश्चिद्भविष्यति
text.ur: astrayuddhe samo vīra na te kaś cid bhaviṣyati

text.ascii: apramattaH sadA dakSaH satyavAdI jitendriyaH
text.ur: apramattaḥ sadā dakṣaḥ satyavādī jitendriyaḥ

text.ascii: brahmaNyaz cAstravic cAsi zUraz cAsi kurUdvaha
text.ur: brahmaṇyaś cāstravic cāsi śūraś cāsi kurūdvaha

text.ascii: astrANi samavAptAni tvayA daza ca paJca ca
text.ud: अस्त्राणि समवाप्तानि त्वया दश च पञ्च च
text.ur: astrāṇi samavāptāni tvayā daśa ca pañca ca

text.ascii: paJcabhir vidhibhiH pArtha na tvayA vidyate samaH
text.ud: पञ्चभिर्विधिभिः पार्थ न त्वया विद्यते समः
text.ur: pañcabhir vidhibhiḥ pārtha na tvayā vidyate samaḥ

text.ascii: prayogam upasaMhAram AvRttiM ca dhanaMjaya
text.ur: prayogam upasaṁhāram āvr̥ttiṁ ca dhanaṁjaya

text.ascii: prAyazcittaM ca vettha tvaM pratighAtaM ca sarvazaH
text.ud: प्रायश्चित्तं च वेत्थ त्वं प्रतिघातं च सर्वशः
text.ur: prāyaścittaṁ ca vettha tvaṁ pratighātaṁ ca sarvaśaḥ

text.ascii: tava gurvarthakAlo 'yam upapannaH paraMtapa
text.ur: tava gurvarthakālo ’yam upapannaḥ paraṁtapa

text.ascii: pratijAnISva taM kartum ato vetsyAmy ahaM param
text.ur: pratijānīṣva taṁ kartum ato vetsyāmy ahaṁ param

text.ascii: tato 'ham abruvaM rAjan devarAjam idaM vacaH
text.ur: tato ’ham abruvaṁ rājan devarājam idaṁ vacaḥ

text.ascii: viSahyaM cen mayA kartuM kRtam eva nibodha tat
text.ud: विषह्यं चेन्मया कर्तुं कृतमेव निबोध तत्
text.ur: viṣahyaṁ cen mayā kartuṁ kr̥tam eva nibodha tat

text.ascii: tato mAm abravId rAjan prahasya balavRtrahA
text.ur: tato mām abravīd rājan prahasya balavr̥trahā

text.ascii: nAviSahyaM tavAdyAsti triSu lokeSu kiM cana
text.ur: nāviṣahyaṁ tavādyāsti triṣu lokeṣu kiṁ cana

text.ascii: nivAtakavacA nAma dAnavA mama zatravaH
text.ur: nivātakavacā nāma dānavā mama śatravaḥ

text.ascii: samudrakukSim Azritya durge prativasanty uta
text.ur: samudrakukṣim āśritya durge prativasanty uta

text.ascii: tisraH koTyaH samAkhyAtAs tulyarUpabalaprabhAH
text.ur: tisraḥ koṭyaḥ samākhyātās tulyarūpabalaprabhāḥ

text.ascii: tAMs tatra jahi kaunteya gurvarthas te bhaviSyati
text.ur: tāṁs tatra jahi kaunteya gurvarthas te bhaviṣyati

text.ascii: tato mAtalisaMyuktaM mayUrasamaromabhiH
text.ur: tato mātalisaṁyuktaṁ mayūrasamaromabhiḥ

text.ascii: hayair upetaM prAdAn me rathaM divyaM mahAprabham
text.ur: hayair upetaṁ prādān me rathaṁ divyaṁ mahāprabham

text.ascii: babandha caiva me mUrdhni kirITam idam uttamam
text.ur: babandha caiva me mūrdhni kirīṭam idam uttamam

text.ascii: svarUpasadRzaM caiva prAdAd aGgavibhUSaNam
text.ur: svarūpasadr̥śaṁ caiva prādād aṅgavibhūṣaṇam

text.ascii: abhedyaM kavacaM cedaM sparzarUpavad uttamam
text.ur: abhedyaṁ kavacaṁ cedaṁ sparśarūpavad uttamam

text.ascii: ajarAM jyAm imAM cApi gANDIve samayojayat
text.ur: ajarāṁ jyām imāṁ cāpi gāṇḍīve samayojayat

text.ascii: tataH prAyAm ahaM tena syandanena virAjatA
text.ur: tataḥ prāyām ahaṁ tena syandanena virājatā

text.ascii: yenAjayad devapatir baliM vairocaniM purA
text.ur: yenājayad devapatir baliṁ vairocaniṁ purā

text.ascii: tato devAH sarva eva tena ghoSeNa bodhitaH
text.ud: ततो देवाः सर्व एव तेन घोषेण बोधितः
text.ur: tato devāḥ sarva eva tena ghoṣeṇa bodhitaḥ

text.ascii: manvAnA devarAjaM mAM samAjagmur vizAM pate
text.ur: manvānā devarājaṁ māṁ samājagmur viśāṁ pate

text.ascii: dRSTvA ca mAm apRcchanta kiM kariSyasi phalguna
text.ud: दृष्ट्वा च मामपृच्छन्त किं करिष्यसि फल्गुन
text.ur: dr̥ṣṭvā ca mām apr̥cchanta kiṁ kariṣyasi phalguna

text.ascii: tAn abruvaM yathAbhUtam idaM kartAsmi saMyuge
text.ur: tān abruvaṁ yathābhūtam idaṁ kartāsmi saṁyuge

text.ascii: nivAtakavacAnAM tu prasthitaM mAM vadhaiSiNam
text.ur: nivātakavacānāṁ tu prasthitaṁ māṁ vadhaiṣiṇam

text.ascii: nibodhata mahAbhAgAH zivaM cAzAsta me 'naghAH
text.ur: nibodhata mahābhāgāḥ śivaṁ cāśāsta me ’naghāḥ

text.ascii: tuSTuvur mAM prasannAs te yathA devaM puraMdaram
text.ur: tuṣṭuvur māṁ prasannās te yathā devaṁ puraṁdaram

text.ascii: rathenAnena maghavA jitavAJ zambaraM yudhi
text.ur: rathenānena maghavā jitavāñ śambaraṁ yudhi

text.ascii: namuciM balavRtrau ca prahlAdanarakAv api
text.ur: namuciṁ balavr̥trau ca prahlādanarakāv api

text.ascii: bahUni ca sahasrANi prayutAny arbudAni ca
text.ur: bahūni ca sahasrāṇi prayutāny arbudāni ca

text.ascii: rathenAnena daityAnAM jitavAn maghavAn yudhi
text.ur: rathenānena daityānāṁ jitavān maghavān yudhi

text.ascii: tvam apy etena kaunteya nivAtakavacAn raNe
text.ur: tvam apy etena kaunteya nivātakavacān raṇe

text.ascii: vijetA yudhi vikramya pureva maghavAn vazI
text.ur: vijetā yudhi vikramya pureva maghavān vaśī

text.ascii: ayaM ca zaGkhapravaro yena jetAsi dAnavAn
text.ud: अयं च शङ्खप्रवरो येन जेतासि दानवान्
text.ur: ayaṁ ca śaṅkhapravaro yena jetāsi dānavān

text.ascii: anena vijitA lokAH zakreNApi mahAtmanA
text.ur: anena vijitā lokāḥ śakreṇāpi mahātmanā

text.ascii: pradIyamAnaM devais tu devadattaM jalodbhavam
text.ur: pradīyamānaṁ devais tu devadattaṁ jalodbhavam

text.ascii: pratyagRhNaM jayAyainaM stUyamAnas tadAmaraiH
text.ur: pratyagr̥hṇaṁ jayāyainaṁ stūyamānas tadāmaraiḥ

text.ascii: sa zaGkhI kavacI bANI pragRhItazarAsanaH
text.ur: sa śaṅkhī kavacī bāṇī pragr̥hītaśarāsanaḥ

text.ascii: dAnavAlayam atyugraM prayAto 'smi yuyutsayA
text.ur: dānavālayam atyugraṁ prayāto ’smi yuyutsayā
